song_name: Sonata no 2 in Bb minor 'Marche Funebre' - III
metrics_conclusion: In terms of chords and melody, Sonata no 2 in Bb minor 'Marche Funebre' - III is more complex than the typical song, having above average scores in Chord Complexity, Melodic Complexity, Chord Progression Novelty and Chord-Bass Melody.
key_conclusion: Sonata no 2 in Bb minor 'Marche Funebre' - III has sections analyzed in the following keys: B♭ Minor, D♭ Major,  and A♭ Major.  Click on the linked cheat sheets for popular chords, chord progressions, downloadable midi files and more!
